member.name: T:System.Reflection.DispatchProxy

summary.vsli:raw: Provides a mechanism for instantiating proxy objects and handling their method dispatch.

member.summary: 提供实例化代理对象和处理其方法调度的机制。

member.name: M:System.Reflection.DispatchProxy.Create``2

summary.vsli:raw: Creates an object instance that derives from class <typeparamref name="TProxy" /> and implements interface <typeparamref name="T" />.

member.summary: 创建一个派生自类 的对象实例，并实现接口 。

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.vsli:raw: The interface the proxy should implement.

typeparam.name: TProxy
typeparam.vsli:raw: The base class to use for the proxy class.

exception.vsli:raw: <typeparamref name="T" /> is a class, or <typeparamref name="TProxy" /> is sealed or does not have a parameterless constructor.

member.exception: 是一个类，或者 是密封的，或没有无参数构造函数。

returns.vsli:raw: An object instance that implements <typeparamref name="T" />.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.DispatchProxy.Invoke(System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object[])

summary.vsli:raw: Whenever any method on the generated proxy type is called, this method is invoked to dispatch control.

member.summary: 每当对生成的代理类型调用任何方法时，都会调用此方法来调度控件。

param.name: args
param.vsli:raw: The arguments the caller passed to the method.

member.param: 调用方传递给方法的参数。

returns.vsli:raw: The object to return to the caller, or <see langword="null" /> for void methods.

member.returns: 要返回调用方的对象，或 void 方法的 。
